axiom\_box.name: Box-Level Consistency Axiom
axiom\_box.intent: Guarantee operator closure, Box validity, and Ω-normal form.
axiom\_box.domain: All Box-level operators (BOX, ROUTER, NORMALIZE, EVAL, PROJECT, DEVIATE, WEIGHT, CURVE, WAVE, SUM, STEP, FEDERATE)
constraints: BOX(B) always returns a canonical sealed Box.
NORMALIZE(B) enforces Ω(B) \= 0 for all global invariants.
Operator composition is closed under MBC-4.0 Box algebra.
cross\_links: Primitive Axiom: μ local weight density
